column5: Our spacious home is only 3 miles to Texas A&M University, and is close to Post Oak Mall, and many local parks. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the high ceilings and we are located right off of highway 6. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). We have 1 king bed, 1 queen blowup mattress, a couch, a pack and play and crib if needed.
